doc.title: Schools
doc.snippet: With the great ambition and big strategy of “with arts to govern the country, with science to trengthen the country and with business to enrich the country”, Nankai University has set up three disciplines standing like a triple, i.e. arts, science and business disciplines, since 1919 when the school was founded. Meeting need of economic and social development at that time, Business School of Nankai University developed rapidly and has a great influence at home and abroad.
